content: {"locationId": "1540", "organizationId": "1401", "name": "Community Hope Center", "address1": "1201 Hope Center Ln", "address2": "", "city": "Cottage Hills", "state": "IL", "zipCode": "62018", "country": null, "phone": "618-259-0959", "phoneExt": "", "website": "https://chcil.org", "latitude": "38.92", "longitude": "-90.08", "foodPrograms": "Food Pantry", "serviceAreas": "", "languages": "English, Spanish", "features": "Parking Available", "aboutUs": "   https://chcil.org  It starts with food....but it doesn't stop there.  Community is all about helping each other through challenging times.   Food assistance is available every other week for registered guests.  We also offer Community Navigators, Spiritual Care, and lunch at our Soup for the Soul Cafe.      Mission:     Connecting neighbors through service and partnership to build flourishing lives and commuities.     Vision:     To be a community overflowing with generosity and compassion, where everyone experiences wholeness and the sustaining hope of Jesus.            Christ-centered       Dignity of all people     Hope     Community     Service      ", "notes": "Appointments are required to received services.  Please call 618-251-8021 to make an appointment to access the food pantry and community navigation.  The Soup for the Soul Cafe is open to the public and no appointment is needed.  It is open on Monday, Wednesday and Friday from 10 am - 1 pm and Tuesday from 10 am - 12 pm.  It is closed on Thursday.", "contactName": "Community Hope Center", "contactPhone": "618-259-0959", "contactEmail": "hopecenter@chcil.org", "servicePrograms": "", "foodServiceTypes": "Grocery / Client Choice, Indoor Service, Lifting / Carrying Assistance", "dietRestrictions": "", "foodOfferings": "Dairy, Eggs, Fruits & Vegetables, Meat, Prepared Food / Grab and Go, Shelf Stable/Non-Perishable Goods", "networkAffiliations": [{"regionId": 17, "regionName": "St. Louis Area Foodbank", "logoBlobNameSmall": "2663eb40-ca6e-413e-8ab2-bf60bbdd2771.jpg", "website": "https://stlfoodbank.org/"}], "timeZoneName": "Central Standard Time", "timeZoneCode": "CT", "offsetHours": "-5", "schedules": ["Monday 9:00 AM-1:00 PM", "Monday 9:00 AM-1:00 PM", "Tuesday 9:00 AM-12:00 PM", "Tuesday 9:00 AM-12:00 PM", "Wednesday 9:00 AM-1:00 PM", "Wednesday 9:00 AM-1:00 PM", "Thursday 4:00 PM-7:00 PM", "Thursday 4:00 PM-7:00 PM", "Friday 9:00 AM-1:00 PM", "Friday 9:00 AM-1:00 PM"], "services": [], "specialHours": []}
